question: [Study] Nederlands: Bepaal the slope of the noisy line van de getekende lijn.

qas.question: [Study] Nederlands: Bepaal the slope of the noisy line van de getekende lijn.
[Detailed] English: Identify the intercept of the noisy line for the plotted line.
[Check] Dansk: Giv the value of y when x equals 1 for den viste linje.
